title: Chicago Air and Water Show
description: The Chicago Air and Water Show presented by the City of Chicago is the largest FREE show of its kind in the United States. The show can be viewed along the lakefront from Fullerton to Oak Street, with North Avenue Beach as the focal point.
cleaned_text: Chicago Air and Water Show Saturday & Sunday, August 19 & 20, 2023 (Rehearsal on Friday, August 18) North Ave. Beach and along the Lakefront 10:30am-3pm Both Days FREE Admission The Chicago Air and Water Show presented by the City of Chicago is the largest FREE show of its kind in the United States. The show can be viewed along the lakefront from Fullerton to Oak Street, with North Avenue Beach as the focal point. [Performers](/content/city/en/depts/dca/supp_info/chicago_air_and_watershow7.html) Headliners of the 2023 show include the U.S. Air Force Thunderbirds and the U.S. Army Parachute Team Golden Knights. [Ten Tips for Enjoying the Show](/content/city/en/depts/dca/provdrs/attractions_eventsandexhibitions/news/2023/august/aw.html) Show organizers offer helpful tips for first-time and long-time visitors alike. [Plan Your Visit & Accessibility](/content/city/en/depts/dca/supp_info/chicago_air_and_watershow2.html) Access audio description and experience every twist and turn during the show. [Voice of the Show](/content/city/en/depts/dca/supp_info/chicago_air_and_watershow0.html) Herb Hunter (pictured) has been the voice of the Air & Water Show for over 20 years. Sponsors Visit us: Admission is FREE Find us: [North Avenue Beach](https://www.google.com/maps/place/North+Avenue+Beach/@41.919059,-87.625137,13z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x880fd366ec660f0f:0x1b2c609110c71b7f!8m2!3d41.9172219!4d-87.6269675?hl=en-US) 1600 N. Lake Shore Dr. Chicago, IL 60613 Pole Markers: [Get Lost In The Show, Not On The Beach](/content/city/en/depts/dca/supp_info/chicago_air_and_watershow6.html) Public Transportation: Take CTA to the Chicago Air & Water Show Bus #72 goes to North Avenue Beach.
